job_title: Devops / MLOps developer for full time contract role
job_description:
## Please read the complete job description before applying ##

## Full time contract job == No project outsourcing == No task based job ##

## Timings : Evening shift 5:00PM to 1:00AM IST, Monday - Friday ##

## Experience : 7+ years ##

## Package: INR 80,000 to 1,50,000 per month as per experience ##

## Selection: Technical interviews (2 rounds) ##

## Open for freelancers from INDIA only ##

## No company / agency please ##

- 4+ years of experience in DevOps/MLOps

- 3+ years experience working on machine learning pipelines

- A passion for automating everything

- Strong AWS cloud experience

- Familiar with time-series analytics

- Familiar with deep learning algorithms such as CNN, LSTM

- Familiar with Pytorch, Tensorflow, Sklearn, XGBoost

- Familiar with data pipelines

- Familiar with AWS Sagemaker

Responsibilities:

- Lead and drive MLOps projects from beginning to end

- Frame and structure questions, collect and analyze data, research, prototype, and build machine learning pipelines, and runtime services of models in production

- Have a strategic perspective of how several machine learning solutions come together against a team, technical product strategy, and lead to an optimal sequence of work

- Excellent communication skills with demonstrated experience driving teams forward and the ability to influence technical decisions to line up with the company’s strategy

Qualifications: 3+ years experience working on machine learning pipelines
Familiar with deep learning algorithms such as CNN, LSTM
Familiar with Pytorch, Tensorflow, Sklearn, XGBoost
Excellent communication skills with demonstrated experience driving teams forward and the ability to influence technical decisions to line up with the company’s strategy
